item.title: By: Margaret Spicer
item.dc:creator: Margaret Spicer
item.description: Also in the proof in lemma 2.1 on page 3 the denominator is overkill. The calculation can be done in 3 lines.
item.content:encoded: Also in the proof in lemma 2.1 on page 3 the denominator is overkill. The calculation can be done in 3 lines.

item.title: By: Margaret Spicer
item.dc:creator: Margaret Spicer
item.description: Typo (x-a) should be (x+a) in (x − a) d/dx(x + a)^n = n(x + a) ^(n-1) (top of page 7)
item.content:encoded: Typo (x-a) should be (x+a) in (x − a) d/dx(x + a)^n = n(x + a) ^(n-1) (top of page 7)
